A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was one of the worst movies I have ever seen. I'm embarrassed to admit that it called itself \"Star Wars\". At so many points in the movie\, my brain was bouncing all over between unnecessary characters and what path they would take. The movie was even worse than that of it's predecessor \"The Force Awakens\"\, which in itself was shameful enough. What a waste of my time and money.
